content: *****this listing is for a pdf printable pattern not a finished product***** i m excited to share this sweet hippopotamus pattern with you by including or excluding eyelashes you can make your hippo in a boy or girl version this is a beginner friendly pattern that s great for all skill levels you will want to be familiar with working in a magic_ring and sewing of parts you can find tips to amigurumi and this free pattern on my blog www graceandyarn com this listing is for the ad-free pdf version finished size is approximately 13 inches tall the legs and body are made as one piece with the head sewn on separately to add extra strength materials you will need size 4 worsted weight yarn 150g color of choice small amount of white 3 5 mm crochet hook 15mm safety eyes black crochet/embroidery thread for eyelashes optional scissors and tapestry needle stuffing stitch markers abbreviations used us terminology mc- magic_ring single_crochet- single_crochet single_crochet increase- single_crochet increase inv decrease- invisible decrease double_crochet- double_crochet st s - stitch es you may make items to sell gift or donate with this pattern if you sell online please provide a link back to my website for credit as the designer www graceandyarn com you may not sell make copies or share the actual pattern thank you thanks so much for stopping by
